      • addTrackingPosition

        public static int addTrackingPosition(int imageX,
                                      int imageY,
                                      int[] trackableId,
                                      int trackingMethod)
        Add tracking position on Image coordinate.
        Parameters:
        imageX - X position on Image coordinate
        imageY - Y position on Image coordinate
        trackableId - trackableId container which is created by VidChaser engine
        trackingMethod - Tracking method index
        Returns:
        Return result code

      • setTrackingImage

        public static int setTrackingImage(byte[] imageData,
                                   int startOffset,
                                   int imageWidth,
                                   int imageHeight,
                                   int imageFormat,
                                   int imageIndex)
        Track frame working.
        Parameters:
        imageData - Image data array
        startOffset - buffer start index
        imageWidth - Camera frame width
        imageHeight - Camera frame height
        imageFormat - Image pixel format. 0 is RGBA32, 1 is RGB24, 2 is YUV420sp
        imageIndex - Set calculation method of result matrix. true is Affine transform, false is rigid transform.
        Returns:
        Return result code

      • destroy

        public static int destroy()
        Destroy tracker engine.
        Returns:
        Return result code

        public static java.lang.String getEngineVersion()

        Engine version.
